_sText:
de_avalanche is a port of the official dod_avalanche map from Day of Defeat: Source game.

Now this map is adapted for plant a bomb by terrorists.

Original map description:

September 1943, Italy. A couple of days after consolidating command in the beach town of Salerno, on September 13th, American forces, advancing towards the hills, were stopped by a furious German counterattack. Bloody battles for the city followed, during which it changed hands several times a day.
